languages.text: {n}Арджента рассеянно проводит пальцами по фрагменту золотой {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}аквилы{/g}, что висит у нее на поясе.{/n} "Моя память — как клочки дыма над полем отгремевшего боя. Серость корабельной обшивки, четкий ритм жизни военных лагерей. Форма матери — я любила разглядывать ее. Потом — тот бой... грохот, крики и копоть. Вопли горящих заживо солдат. И золото полковой аквилы — последняя незапятнанная гарью и кровью частичка сходящего с ума мира".

traits.locale_text: {n}Арджента рассеянно проводит пальцами по фрагменту золотой {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}аквилы{/g}, что висит у нее на поясе.{/n} "Моя память — как клочки дыма над полем отгремевшего боя. Серость корабельной обшивки, четкий ритм жизни военных лагерей. Форма матери — я любила разглядывать ее. Потом — тот бой... грохот, крики и копоть. Вопли горящих заживо солдат. И золото полковой аквилы — последняя незапятнанная гарью и кровью частичка сходящего с ума мира".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta absent-mindedly touches the fragment of the golden {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} hanging from her belt.{/n} "My memory is like wafts of smoke over a still battlefield. The grey of a ship's plating, the strict cadence of life in military camps. My mother's uniform — I loved looking at it. Then — that battle... the rumbling, the shouting, and the soot. The screams of soldiers burning alive. And the gold of the regiment's Aquila — untouched by soot or blood, the last unsullied piece of a world that was going mad."
languages.original_text: {n}Арджента рассеянно проводит пальцами по фрагменту золотой {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}аквилы{/g}, что висит у нее на поясе.{/n} "Моя память — как клочки дыма над полем отгремевшего боя. И золото полковой аквилы — последняя незапятнанная гарью и кровью частичка сходящего с ума мира".

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔心不在焉地摸着她腰带上金色{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}双头鹰{/g}的碎片。{/n}“我的记忆就像一缕青烟，飘荡在死寂的战场上。船上灰色的甲板，军营中严格的生活节奏，还有我母亲的制服——我很喜欢看着它。随后，便是那场战斗……轰隆声，叫喊声，烟尘，士兵们被活活烧死的惨叫声，还有军团的金质双头鹰徽章。它没有沾上烟尘，也没有染上血迹，仿佛是那个走向疯狂的世界中最后一件没被玷污的东西。”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta absent-mindedly touches the fragment of the golden {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} hanging from her belt.{/n} "My memory is like wafts of smoke over a still battlefield. The grey of a ship's plating, the strict cadence of life in military camps. My mother's uniform — I loved looking at it. Then — that battle... the rumbling, the shouting, and the soot. The screams of soldiers burning alive. And the gold of the regiment's Aquila — untouched by soot or blood, the last unsullied piece of a world that was going mad."

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Argenta absent-mindedly touches the fragment of the golden Aquila hanging from her belt.{/n} "My memory is like wafts of smoke over a still battlefield. The grey of a ship's plating, the strict cadence of life in military camps. My mother's uniform — I loved looking at it. Then — that battle... the rumbling, the shouting, and the soot. The screams of soldiers burning alive. And the gold of the regiment's Aquila — untouched by soot or blood, the last unsullied piece of a world that was going mad."

languages.text: {n}Argenta, distraída, toca el fragmento de {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} dorada que cuelga de su cinturón.{/n} «Mi memoria es como los jirones de humo sobre un campo de batalla quieto. Recuerdo el gris del blindaje de una nave y la estricta cadencia de la vida en un campamento militar. El uniforme de mi madre... me encantaba mirarlo. Y después, la batalla... sonidos atronadores, gritos y hollín. Soldados ardiendo vivos. Y el Aquila dorada del regimiento, sin manchas de sangre ni hollín, el último trozo impoluto de un mundo que estaba enloqueciendo».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta absent-mindedly touches the fragment of the golden {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} hanging from her belt.{/n} "My memory is like wafts of smoke over a still battlefield. The grey of a ship's plating, the strict cadence of life in military camps. My mother's uniform — I loved looking at it. Then — that battle... the rumbling, the shouting, and the soot. The screams of soldiers burning alive. And the gold of the regiment's Aquila — untouched by soot or blood, the last unsullied piece of a world that was going mad."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta, distraída, toca el fragmento de {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} dorada que cuelga de su cinturón.{/n} «Mi memoria es como los jirones de humo sobre un campo de batalla quieto. Recuerdo el gris del blindaje de una nave y la estricta cadencia de la vida en un campamento militar. El uniforme de mi madre... me encantaba mirarlo. Y después, la batalla... sonidos atronadores, gritos y hollín. Soldados ardiendo vivos. Y el Aquila dorada del regimiento, sin manchas de sangre ni hollín, el último trozo impoluto de un mundo que estaba enloqueciendo».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタは心ここにあらずと行った様子で、ベルトからぶら下がっている黄金の{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}アクィラ{/g}の破片に触れる。{/n}「私の記憶は、静まり返った戦場に漂う煙のようなものだ。母の軍服…私はそれを見るのが好きだった。それから…あの戦い…轟音、叫び声、そして煤煙。生きながら焼かれる兵士たちの悲鳴。そして連隊のアクィラの黄金…これは、煤煙や血に汚されることなく、狂い始めた世界の最後の汚れのない欠片だったのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta absent-mindedly touches the fragment of the golden {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} hanging from her belt.{/n} "My memory is like wafts of smoke over a still battlefield. The grey of a ship's plating, the strict cadence of life in military camps. My mother's uniform — I loved looking at it. Then — that battle... the rumbling, the shouting, and the soot. The screams of soldiers burning alive. And the gold of the regiment's Aquila — untouched by soot or blood, the last unsullied piece of a world that was going mad."

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタは心ここにあらずと行った様子で、ベルトからぶら下がっている黄金の{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}アクィラ{/g}の破片に触れる。{/n}「私の記憶は、静まり返った戦場に漂う煙のようなものだ。母の軍服…私はそれを見るのが好きだった。それから…あの戦い…轟音、叫び声、そして煤煙。生きながら焼かれる兵士たちの悲鳴。そして連隊のアクィラの黄金…これは、煤煙や血に汚されることなく、狂い始めた世界の最後の汚れのない欠片だったのだ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta berührt gedankenverloren das Fragment der goldenen {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}, das an ihrem Gürtel hängt.{/n} "Meine Erinnerung gleich Rauchschwaden über einem stillen Schlachtfeld. Das Grau der Panzerung eines Schiffs. Die strikte Kadenz des Lebens in militärischen Lagern. Die Uniform meiner Mutter — ich habe es geliebt, sie anzusehen. Dann — diese Schlacht ... das Grollen, das Geschrei, der Ruß. Die Schreie der Soldaten, die bei lebendigem Leib verbrennen. Und das Gold der Aquila des Regiments — von Ruß und Blut unberührt, das letzte unbefleckte Stück einer Welt, die im Wahnsinn versunken war."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta absent-mindedly touches the fragment of the golden {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} hanging from her belt.{/n} "My memory is like wafts of smoke over a still battlefield. The grey of a ship's plating, the strict cadence of life in military camps. My mother's uniform — I loved looking at it. Then — that battle... the rumbling, the shouting, and the soot. The screams of soldiers burning alive. And the gold of the regiment's Aquila — untouched by soot or blood, the last unsullied piece of a world that was going mad."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta berührt gedankenverloren das Fragment der goldenen {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}, das an ihrem Gürtel hängt.{/n} "Meine Erinnerung gleich Rauchschwaden über einem stillen Schlachtfeld. Das Grau der Panzerung eines Schiffs. Die strikte Kadenz des Lebens in militärischen Lagern. Die Uniform meiner Mutter — ich habe es geliebt, sie anzusehen. Dann — diese Schlacht ... das Grollen, das Geschrei, der Ruß. Die Schreie der Soldaten, die bei lebendigem Leib verbrennen. Und das Gold der Aquila des Regiments — von Ruß und Blut unberührt, das letzte unbefleckte Stück einer Welt, die im Wahnsinn versunken war."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta touche d'un air absent le fragment de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} d'or qui pend à sa ceinture.{/n} « Mes souvenirs semblent pris dans le nuage de fumée d'un champ de bataille immobile. Le gris du blindage d'un vaisseau, la cadence stricte de la vie dans les camps militaires. L'uniforme de ma mère. J'adorais le regarder. Et ensuite, cette bataille... les grondements, les tirs, les volutes de fumée. Les cris des soldats qui brûlaient vifs. Et l'or de l'Aquila du régiment, épargné par la suie et le sang, le dernier fragment immaculé d'un monde devenu fou. »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta absent-mindedly touches the fragment of the golden {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} hanging from her belt.{/n} "My memory is like wafts of smoke over a still battlefield. The grey of a ship's plating, the strict cadence of life in military camps. My mother's uniform — I loved looking at it. Then — that battle... the rumbling, the shouting, and the soot. The screams of soldiers burning alive. And the gold of the regiment's Aquila — untouched by soot or blood, the last unsullied piece of a world that was going mad."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta touche d'un air absent le fragment de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} d'or qui pend à sa ceinture.{/n} « Mes souvenirs semblent pris dans le nuage de fumée d'un champ de bataille immobile. Le gris du blindage d'un vaisseau, la cadence stricte de la vie dans les camps militaires. L'uniforme de ma mère. J'adorais le regarder. Et ensuite, cette bataille... les grondements, les tirs, les volutes de fumée. Les cris des soldats qui brûlaient vifs. Et l'or de l'Aquila du régiment, épargné par la suie et le sang, le dernier fragment immaculé d'un monde devenu fou. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Dalıp giden Argenta, kemerinden sarkan altın {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Çift Başlı Kartal{/g} parçasına dokunuyor.{/n} "Hafızam, dingin bir muharebe meydanının üstünde tüten dumanlar gibi. Bir geminin gri zırhı, askerî kamplarda hayatın sıkı düzeni. Annemin üniforması... Bayılırdım ona bakmaya. Sonra... O muharebe... Gürültüler, bağırtılar, is. Canlı canlı yanan askerlerin çığlıkları. Alayın Çift Başlı Kartal'ından yansıyan o altın renk. Üstüne ne is ne de kan değmiş, çivisi çıkmakta olan bu dünyanın lekesiz son parçası."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta absent-mindedly touches the fragment of the golden {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} hanging from her belt.{/n} "My memory is like wafts of smoke over a still battlefield. The grey of a ship's plating, the strict cadence of life in military camps. My mother's uniform — I loved looking at it. Then — that battle... the rumbling, the shouting, and the soot. The screams of soldiers burning alive. And the gold of the regiment's Aquila — untouched by soot or blood, the last unsullied piece of a world that was going mad."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta, dalgın bir hâlde kemerinden sarkan altın {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Çift Başlı Kartal{/g} parçasına dokunuyor.{/n} "Hafızam, dingin bir muharebe meydanının üstünde tüten dumanlar gibi. Bir geminin gri renkli zırhı, askerî kamplarda hayatın sıkı düzeni. Annemin üniforması... Bayılırdım ona bakmaya. Sonra... o muharebe... Gürültüler, bağırtılar, is. Canlı canlı yanan askerlerin çığlıkları. Alayların Çift Başlı Kartal'ından yansıyan o altın renk. Üstüne ne is ne de kan değmiş, çivisi çıkmakta olan bu dünyanın lekesiz son parçası."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
